name: Wobleck - Game Jam Ver
description:
You have crashed on a mysterious alien planet. Use your trusty robot partner, Wobleck, to find and repair the parts of your communicator beacon and make your way back home. Throw Wobleck and control him to solve puzzles scattered throughout the island and find your communicator pieces.

Instructions

LMB - throw robot
RMB - call back robot
middle mouse button - change views
e - close text box
ESC - pause
